H0.text: What kind of bird is a guillemot. Waterfowl

H1.text: What kind of bird is a guillemot. Songbird

H2.text: What kind of bird is a guillemot. Game Bird

H3.text: What kind of bird is a guillemot. Seabird

A4.text: The common murre or common guillemot (Uria aalge) is a large auk, one of several species called murre or guillemot.

A5.text: It has a circumpolar distribution, occurring in lowâ€‘Arctic and boreal waters in the North Atlantic and North Pacific.
